participant_1.background:
I like to read books and watch documentaries to expand my knowledge.
I love to visit my mother in the afternoon and try on some of her shoes.
i own four german shepherds.
I am slightly overweight but working on it.
i take my emotions out through art.

participant_2.background:
I am a woman who worries about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation.
I'm prone to tripping over my own two feet and dropping things.
I was a hockey player in my youth, but now I enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.
It's a bit chilly, but I'm looking forward to taking my dog hiking later.
I'd be scared to tell my family, but I think they'd be accepting.

content.text: Hey there, how are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks! What are your hobbies?
I enjoy fishing, hiking, and spending time with my dog.
That sounds nice! I'm more of a bookworm and art enthusiast, myself.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I'm particularly interested in historical fiction and nonfiction.
I've never been much of a reader, but I've been trying to get into it more. Do you have any recommendations?
Sure, I have a few! One of my favorite historical fiction books is {{All the Light We Cannot See
